features: Optimal Wellness: A daily supplement formulated with key nutrients to maintain health and wellness with just two capsules daily
Comprehensive Formula: Contains key vitamins and minerals for foundational support – including heart, brain, nerve, immune, bone, and skin health
Well-Absorbed Nutrients: Provides vitamins A, B’s, C, D, E, K1, and K2, as well as minerals with high absorbability
Free From: Doesn't contain gluten, eggs, tree nuts, peanuts, dairy, soy, fish, or shellfish

Trusted: Thorne is chosen by champions and trusted by 100+ pro teams. Thorne is the only supplement manufacturer to collaborate with Mayo Clinic on wellness research and content. Thorne is also a proud partner of 11 U.S. Olympic Teams

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Basic Nutrients 2/Day is a comprehensive daily supplement designed for individuals looking for nutritional support with fewer capsules.

Taking a multi-vitamin/mineral supplement is important for establishing a solid foundational health routine. Many nutrition experts have identified a “nutrition gap” between the nutrients consumed in the diet and what is required for optimal health – a gap that can be filled by taking a daily multi-vitamin/mineral supplement. Although ideally we would get all the nutrients we need from eating a healthy and well-balanced diet, that is easier said than done. In addition, nutrient needs vary from person to person and depend on multiple factors, including activity levels, age, gender, and the presence of chronic illness. Thorne takes all of these factors into account and offers different multi-vitamin/mineral supplements to fit individual nutrient needs.

Multi-Vitamin Elite Women's Multi 50+ Men's Multi 50+ Basic Nutrients 2/Day Basic Prenatal Perfect For Active individuals who have high-performance nutritional regimens Best multi-vitamins for women over age 50 Women at low risk for iron deficiency Best multi-vitamins for men over age 50 Men at low risk for iron deficiency Everyday use for individuals of every age Individuals looking for nutritional support with fewer capsules Women who are trying to conceive, are pregnant, or are nursing. How to Use Take 3 capsules of the A.M. formula in the morning with a meal and 3 capsules of the P.M. formula in the evening with a meal 3-6 capsules per day is the suggested use We recommend taking it with a meal and you can take the capsules throughout the day instead of all at once, if needed. 3-6 capsules per day is the suggested use We recommend taking it with a meal and you can take the capsules throughout the day instead of all at once, if needed. Easy to use at only 2 capsules per day Take 3 capsules daily with food Unique Benefits NSF Certified for Sport Two formulas: The A.M. formula promotes energy production, while the P.M. formula supports sleep and recovery.* Contains two optimally absorbed minerals for bone health – calcium and magnesium – in highly absorbable chelate form.* Doesn’t contain copper or iron. Contains optimally absorbed magnesium for muscle support, and zinc for prostate support.* Doesn’t contain copper or iron. Available as NSF Certified for Sport Active form of folic acid – L-5-methyltetrahydrofolate (5-MTHF) Contains choline Formulated with the special needs of conception, pregnancy, and breastfeeding in mind.* Contains well-absorbed, tissue-ready vitamins and minerals that are gentle on the stomach and non-constipating.

When the highest standards have been met, Thorne creates higher ones. Sourcing Exceptional Ingredients We develop better standards for higher quality ingredients. Thorne cares deeply about where our ingredients come from. We partner only with suppliers whose practices emphasize quality, science, and responsibility. Better ingredients means better potency, absorption, and digestibility - and ultimately better health. Manufacturing the Right Way We manufacture our own products to ensure full supply chain transparency. For more than 30 years, we have invested in clean manufacturing practices. We refuse to use ingredients that can inhibit absorption. We perform our final production in the United States. Our Charleston, SC facility is third-party certified. Four Rounds of Testing We perform four rounds of testing for each product we manufacture – far above the industry standard. Thorne has invested in two state-of-the-art in-house laboratories that enable us to conduct four rounds of testing, including raw material testing, in-process batch testing, finished product testing, and expiration date stability testing for each lot of product that we manufacture. Thinking Sustainably We're thinking sustainably to protect our environment. We believe the environment should never be compromised for the sake of business gain. At Thorne, we believe that doing our part to protect the environment and its most valuable resources goes hand in hand with our product quality standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thorne Basic Nutrients 2/Day has become an integral part of my daily wellness routine, and it stands out as a reliable and comprehensive multivitamin. The optimal bioavailability ensures my body absorbs essential vitamins and minerals efficiently, promoting overall health. I appreciate the thoughtfulness behind its gluten-free, dairy-free, and soy-free formulation, catering to various dietary needs. The convenience of just two capsules a day makes adherence effortless. I've noticed increased energy levels, improved immune support, and enhanced cognitive function since incorporating these vitamins into my routine. Thorne's commitment to quality and purity shines through, making Basic Nutrients 2/Day a trustworthy choice for those seeking a top-notch daily multivitamin supplement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They stink, but they work!
reviews.reviewText: The reviews for Thorne's multivitamin kill me. I have to admit that I was a little hesitant to order them based on the reviews regarding how wretched they smell. Well, I ordered them anyway because the benefits far outweigh the unpleasant odor they give off. They're vitamins, and they smell like it. Some complained that they tainted whatever cupboard or drawer in which they were stored. This is simply not true. I personally don't mind the smell because they're whole-food, bioavailable vitamins. Take a grocery store multi and toss it in a glass of water and see what happens. Nothing happens because they're formulated from fillers and synthetic compounds. I do have to agree with one reviewer who said that they smell like urine. They sort of do, and it made me laugh. I'll take that smell over chemicals and fillers that your body can't use any day of the week.I have chronic GERD, and the vitamins don't affect it. I can tell the quality of a supplement by that metric alone. I am currently weaning myself off my PPI, and these vitamins still don't aggravate my reflux. Synthetic grocery store brands, on the other hand, make me sick. Plug your nose or take them with a meal. Do what you have to do to get them down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clean vitamins.
reviews.reviewText: High quality clean vitamins without filler all good absorbable forms of vitamins. All the basics covered. These vitamins like other high grade vitamins make me feel more energized and mentally clear in my dat however cost less than some other competitors which is a bonus. Thornes reputation speaks for itself in the clean pure vitamin regard . The smell is simular to other vitamins that I’ve had in the past the really good vitamins all tend to have some stink to them. It doesn’t affect me whatsoever and there’s no flavor to it either no burps that taste like it after etc. no stomach discomfort or gastro issues and I’m fairly sensitive to those things. Will continue to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells AWFUL, but it works
reviews.reviewText: The reviews are not dramatic, this is by far the worst smelling vitamin I’ve ever had. It’s so hard to describe, but it’s absolutely nauseating. The stench immediately filled my cupboard. But if you can tolerate the smell, this really is a great multi-vitamin. I can tell because my pee is neon green :) and I feel good. I was never sure if I was being ripped off with vitamins in the past, but this one is no joke. I would give it 5 stars if it didn’t smell so rotten.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars - I have more energy
reviews.reviewText: I love these vitamins and have reordered many times. It's the only vitamin I have ever taken where I feel a noticeable difference in energy level by taking them. I have more energy when I take them. I like to take one in the morning and then one in the afternoon to avoid an afternoon lull. I notice a difference when I run out. I also have not even had a sniffle since I started them quite some time ago. I am very impressed by the quality of this vitamin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sup, Price idk
reviews.reviewText: The Throne/Day is a phenomenal product and can help supplement your daily meals, i like to take one right before sleeping if I've had a hard day or been drinking. i usually take one a day rather than two due to the potency and values of each dose. Still i feel this sup is a great way to take the tedium out of your day of making sure you hit values. btw the bottle does have a certain smell, its not bad but its not familiar. it wont effect the flavor of the capsule.
